website_summaries.verdict: A bold watch that is definitely a statement piece with unique looks and excellent workmanship, but one you may want to reserve for special occasions.
pros: Offers an attractive alternative to silver and gold tone watches, thanks to the all rose gold-tone finish
The addition of the crystal markers and mother-of-pearl face adds to the outstanding style that pairs nicely with high-fashion looks
cons: The dramatic looks of this watch make it a bit impractical to wear with casual outfits

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: A very nice watch. Has a sporty look, nice size & weigh and the rose-tone is pretty. Ultimately I chose to return it and go with a less sporty and more sleek watch.
customer_reviews.author: JewelLuvr

customer_reviews.title: It is stunningly beautiful! I have fallien in love with Rose Gold ...
customer_reviews.text: It is stunningly beautiful! I have fallien in love with Rose Gold and been sighing over this watch for some time and finally decided to take the plunge and order it. Did I need another watch? Nope. Am I happy with it? Ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McCaughin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. The weight to it was nice, and the watch was made flawlessly. The faceplate even looked better in person.
customer_reviews.author: A Three-Toed Sloth

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It fits comfortably, and is beautiful. I love the rose gold and it can be worn with casual or dress clothes. It was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice rose gold Bulova women's watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rose gold watch from Bulova! My wife has really enjoyed the quality and look of rose gold!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, I have use it already a lot and is still looking as new.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful watch! Loved the diamonds how they shine and ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful watch ! Loved the diamonds how they shine and the bezel is just the right size wear casual or on a party simply gorgeous .
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but it seems a little light weight in my opinion.but overall the look of it was pretty exactly what it shows...delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Taichi😎

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my wife as a Christmas present. She absolutely loved it. Beautiful piece as only Bulova can make.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my wife. She loves it, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife. She loves it, and costs much less than going to a jewelry store, for the same watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ulo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves loves loves this watch. Dad points scored to win the game
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Geist

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Nuisance.
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks like it's picture and it has beautiful design and rose gold color. However it's bracelet is too long and I have a pretty standard wrist and love worn many fancy and not fancy watches. So yes, the inconvenient truth is that I have to go take it to the watch place to shorten the length. Another thing is- it's not suitable for shower. It's 2016 outside hello?! My previous Bulova is 6-7 years old and it is waterproof for the shower. I'm not going to scuba dive in it but the shower lever waterproof watch is a must in this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: Irit Braginski

customer_reviews.title: This is a Valentine's Day gift for my girlfriend. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Valentine's Day gift for my girlfriend. She hasn't seen it yet just the box but I showed it to her sister and got the seal of approval. The color and style are not over the top and flashy, shows a bit of style and grace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I couldn't beat the price either. Original almost $400 and I got it as a daily deal for only $80! Bulova is one of my favorite brands in watches and this one is very beautiful! Love the rose gold. The picture doesn't even do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Large face stones beautifully displaced. I get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: This is a beauty. Large face stones beautifully displaced. I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: lovingeveryword

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely beautiful and you can wear it anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for myself several years ago. It's absolutely beautiful and you can wear it anywhere. I recently left it near a sink at work and never saw it again:( I am hoping Santa will bring me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Kennedy Hosier

customer_reviews.title: It is very sharp and fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a graduation present for my girlfriend. She loves rose gold and absolutely loves the watch. It is very sharp and fantastic quality. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. Will have 5 links removed at jeweler ...
customer_reviews.text: Received for xmas as a surprise from my husband. Absolutely love it. Will have 5 links removed at jeweler but no big deal. Love the shine of the band and the face is opalescent, more so than in photo. Comfortable with easy latching. Good price, local jeweler couldn't match. Larger watch therefore more weight but I love feelng it on my wrist. Can't wait for the compliments!
customer_reviews.author: nelsonar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it !! Is my favorite watch thanks for delivery on time
customer_reviews.author: leopoldo vera

product_meta.title: Bulova Women's 98P141 Analog Display Japanese Quartz Watch in Rose-Gold Tone
product_meta.description:
In 1875, a young Czech immigrant named Joseph Bulova set up shop in New York City, and a legendary American watch brand was born. Bulova was trained as a jeweler, and his expertise carried over into his watchmaking career, which began around 1911 with boudoir clocks and pocket watches, and soon evolved to include what was then one of the latest and most fashionable technological innovations: the wristwatch.

 Bulova introduced its first line of wristwatches in 1919. The company grew and prospered, and soon early radio and television ads were declaring, "America runs on Bulova time." In the 1950s, continuing its legacy of innovation, Bulova introduced Accutron, the first electronic watch, and the first breakthrough in timekeeping technology in over 300 years. The Accutron timing mechanism was later adapted for use by NASA computers and a Bulova timer was even placed on the moon to control transmissions of data. Bulova timepieces have kept official time aboard Air Force One and have also served as official timepieces for U.S. Olympic teams.

 Today, Bulova maintains its tradition of excellence in technology and design, offering a diverse collection of beautiful precision timepieces for every occasion.



From the Diamond Gallery Collection. In stainless steel with rose-gold finish, 12 diamonds individually hand-set on a patterned white mother-of-pearl dial, sapphire crystal, white enamel bezel inserts, luminous hands, second hand, double-press fold-over clasp, and water resistance to 30 meters.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.33 x 3.94 x 3.54 inches; 3.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :98P141
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 20, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Bulova
 * ASIN :B00I6D5JHM

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #2,020,559 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #929809 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #11972 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars37 ratings 


In 1875, a young Czech immigrant named Joseph Bulova set up shop in New York City, and a legendary American watch brand was born. Bulova was trained as a jeweler, and his expertise carried over into his watchmaking career, which began around 1911 with boudoir clocks and pocket watches, and soon evolved to include what was then one of the latest and most fashionable technological innovations: the wristwatch.

 Bulova introduced its first line of wristwatches in 1919. The company grew and prospered, and soon early radio and television ads were declaring, "America runs on Bulova time." In the 1950s, continuing its legacy of innovation, Bulova introduced Accutron, the first electronic watch, and the first breakthrough in timekeeping technology in over 300 years. The Accutron timing mechanism was later adapted for use by NASA computers and a Bulova timer was even placed on the moon to control transmissions of data. Bulova timepieces have kept official time aboard Air Force One and have also served as official timepieces for U.S. Olympic teams.

 Today, Bulova maintains its tradition of excellence in technology and design, offering a diverse collection of beautiful precision timepieces for every occasion.



From the Diamond Gallery Collection. In stainless steel with rose-gold finish, 12 diamonds individually hand-set on a patterned white mother-of-pearl dial, sapphire crystal, white enamel bezel inserts, luminous hands, second hand, double-press fold-over clasp, and water resistance to 30 meters.
feature_bullets: Round watch in rose gold-tone stainless steel featuring crystal-accented hour markers, logo at 12 o'clock, and three-link bracelet
Features fold-over clasp with double push-button safety closure
Water resistant to 99 feet (30 M): withstands rain and splashes of water, but not showering or submersion
